titleStmt.title: The womans almanack or, prognostication for ever: shewing the nature of the planets, with the events that shall befall women and children born under them. With several predictions very useful for the female sex. / By Sarah Ginnor student in Physick.
titleStmt.author: Jinner, Sarah, fl. 1658-1664.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
